Sept. 14, 2005 (ref) Bad news for gas engines converted to run on hydrogen. Hydrogen Embrittlement has been detected in some engine components, in some cases severely. It occurs when Hydrogen gas dissolves into the structure of certain metals (usually Aluminum & Ste
